Authors: Xue-Wei Wang, Ji-Hang Jiang, Li-Wei Zhou
Title:
Sequence-based nomenclature will underestimate species
diversity: a case of wood-inhabiting fungi Basidioradulum mayi and B.
tasmanicum spp. nov. (Hymenochaetales, Basidiomycota)
Keywords:
allopatric speciation, barcoding, macrofungi, species
concept, taxonomy, 2 new taxa
